Source.Name: intel-undervolt
Source.Description: intel-undervolt is a tool for undervolting Haswell and newer Intel CPUs using MSR. DISCLAIMER - Solus and/or The Solus team take no responsibility for any damage caused to your hardware from the incorrect use of the intel-undervolt software.
